title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] Add Cloud mode support to Ollama integration
summary:
## Proposed change

This PR adds optional support for **Ollama Cloud** as an additional execution
endpoint for the existing Ollama integration.

Until now, Home Assistant could only communicate with a **local Ollama daemon**.

title: [PR] Convert desktop GUI to FastAPI web app with cloud LLM providers
summary:
Converts the customtkinter desktop application to a FastAPI web service deployable on Render.com. Replaces local Ollama with Groq/Anthropic cloud LLM providers and fixes hardcoded API key security issue.

title: [PR] Implement TTSProcessor Helper Methods for Voice Discovery and Provider Capabilities
summary:
# Pull Request

## Description

Implements helper methods in TTSProcessor for getting available voices and provider capabilities. This utility provides voice discovery and capability checking for Text-to-Speech functionality across supported Google Cloud providers.
